title: How do I reset my password?
content: To reset your password, go to the login page and click on 'Forgot Password'. Enter your email address and follow the instructions sent to your inbox. The link expires in 24 hours.

title: What are the shipping costs?
content: Shipping is free for orders over $50. For orders under $50, a flat rate of $5.99 applies. International shipping is calculated at checkout based on weight and destination.

title: Can I return an item?
content: Yes, you can return items within 30 days of purchase. The item must be unused and in its original packaging. Visit our Returns Center to initiate a return.

title: How do I contact support?
content: You can contact support via email at support@example.com, or call us at 1-800-555-0199. Our support hours are 9 AM to 5 PM EST, Monday through Friday.

title: How can I track my order?
content: Once your package ships, we send a confirmation email with a tracking link. You can also visit the Orders page in your account dashboard, select the order, and click 'Track Shipment' to open the carrier's latest updates.
